akn:subsection.akn:heading: Maintenance of base acres and payment yields

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Maintenance of base acres and payment yields The Secretary shall maintain, for each covered commodity and upland cotton, base acres and payment yields on a farm established under sections 8702 and 8751 of this title, as adjusted pursuant to sections 8711, 8712, 8718, and 8752 of this title, as in effect on September 30, 2013, and as adjusted pursuant to sections 9012 and 9013 of this title.
